name: Comment only - usage question
description: Usage question that requires no code change, only explanation

input.title: How do I use the calculator with floating point numbers?
input.body:
## Question
I'm trying to use the calculator but I'm not sure if it supports floating point numbers.

Can I do something like `add(3.14, 2.86)`?

Also, what's the maximum precision supported?

## Environment
- Python 3.11
- Using the CLI interface
